org.eventchain.layout

Interface TypeHandler<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanTypeHandler, ByteArrayTypeHandler, ByteTypeHandler, CharacterTypeHandler, DoubleTypeHandler, FloatTypeHandler, IntegerTypeHandler, LongTypeHandler, ShortTypeHandler, StringTypeHandler, UnknownTypeHandler, UUIDTypeHandler

    public interface TypeHandler<T>
    Interface for handling supported type T

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int SIZE_TAG_LENGTH 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> constantSize()
      If type is of a constant size, should return a non-empty Optional containing value size in bytes
      T deserialize(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
      Deserializes value of type T from a ByteBuffer's current position
      byte[] getFingerprint()
      Returns unique byte-array "fingerprint" representing type T (used for hashing)
      static TypeHandler lookup(com.fasterxml.classmate.ResolvedType type)
      Looks up a type handler for supported types
      void serialize(T value, java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
      Serializes value of type T to a ByteBuffer.
      int size(T value)

    • Method Detail

      • getFingerprint

        byte[] getFingerprint()
        Returns unique byte-array "fingerprint" representing type T (used for hashing)
        Returns:
        fingerprint

      • size

        int size(T value)
        Parameters:
        value - value to be serialized
        Returns:
        serialized value size in bytes

      • constantSize

        default java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> constantSize()
        If type is of a constant size, should return a non-empty Optional containing value size in bytes
        Returns:
        Optional constant size

      • serialize

        void serialize(T value,
               java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
        Serializes value of type T to a ByteBuffer. ByteBuffer should be of a correct size. The size can be obtained from size(Object)
        Parameters:
        value - value to serialize
        buffer - ByteBuffer

      • deserialize

        T deserialize(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
        Deserializes value of type T from a ByteBuffer's current position
        Parameters:
        buffer - ByteBuffer
        Returns:
        value

      • lookup

        static TypeHandler lookup(com.fasterxml.classmate.ResolvedType type)
        Looks up a type handler for supported types

        Supported types

        • Byte/byte
        • Byte[]/byte[]
        • Short/short
        • Integer/int
        • Long/long
        • Float/float
        • Double/double
        • Boolean/boolean
        • Character/char
        • String
        • UUID
        Parameters:
        type -
        Returns:
